_childDocuments_.string_plaats_van_werkzaamheid_bijzonder:
Scheen(1969-1970) and < c.1967 - c.1997 > (Jacobs 2000)
1964: construction of first bronze foundry, 's-Gravenweg
1965-1967: construction, design and completion of a sailing ship
1969: build second bronze foundry, Oranjeboomstraat
1985: house converted into studio, s' Gravendijkwal, Rotterdam
1990: industrial (storage) building converted for RAM gallery, Hoornbrekerstraat, Rotterdam
2000: design bronze foundry sCULpTUUR, Hoogvliet (Rotterdam), 2001: construction, chairman                           collective
2001: RMI building converted for gallery RAM and Alsop architects, Blekerstraat, Rotterdam
2006: renovation studio,Veilingweg, Rotterdam

lived and worked in Rotterdam and France (Salernes), 
designed (and built) several houses with a studio in Salernes (1980/1985, 2001/2012, 2006)

docs.opmerking_materiaal: worked for a time on a bronze foundry
docs.opmerking_leerling_leraar: taught at the Academy of Visual Arts (Rotterdam) since 1945

vereniging.vereniging_opm:
1984: founder and chairman of STEK, artists' initiative, Ommoordseweg
1988: realized the renovation and construction of STEK, 3 exhibition spaces and a guest house

opmerking_standplaats: Samenwerking  P. Abramsen met I. Kruit, zie MHK/mk/overige techn. op: Abramsen, P.

archiefint.standplaats_archief: beelddocumentatie Stichting Fonds voor beeldende kunsten, vormgeving en bouwkunst (Fonds BKVB)
